overview: From 2025-05-08 to 2025-05-09, elizaos/eliza had 17 new PRs (12 merged), 1 new issues, and 13 active contributors.

completedItems.title: Delete all memories API and client hooks.
completedItems.body:
Adds API and client React hooks to wipe all memories in single request.
This is for: "clear chat" button feature.
Not sure where to put button in UI... tough to decide.

completedItems.title: Combined eli2 279 eli2 280/fix publish cli options platform and skip registry
completedItems.body:
This PR addresses two issues with the ElizaOS CLI publish options:

## 1. Platform Option Removal

- Removed `-px, --platform` option from the publish command
- Set 'node' as the default platform for all packages (via `packageJson.plat

completedItems.title: Eli2 277/fix missing gitignore in plugins created with global cli installation
completedItems.body:
**Problem**

When creating plugins or projects using the globally installed ElizaOS CLI, the generated directories were missing .gitignore and .npmignore files. This happened because npm strips these special files during the package publi
